title: Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing meat by Ibn Sirin Cutting meat inside a dream expresses sadness and anxiety. Cooked meat Be a guide for the monarch to obtain goodness and abundance. When you see yourself cutting meat with a knife in a dream, this is a sign that you are offending someone. Seeing rotten meat is a sign of deteriorating health of insight. When you collect Meat in a dream is evidence of backbiting and gossip. Whoever sees that he is cutting meat and distributing it to people, this indicates worry that will affect many. Seeing camel meat indicates many benefits. If a person sees red meat in his dream while it is raw, this means anxiety and sadness. And distress. If the meat is roasted, all of this person’s fears will disappear. Seeing meat in a dream is good if it is only cooked. Cutting raw meat in a dream means that you will make a lot of effort to achieve goals. Cutting seven meat in a dream is evidence of a lot of money. Whoever dreams in a dream that he is eating the meat of a bird that is not permissible, this is evidence that he is eating something forbidden. Whoever sees that he is eating the meat of a live animal will take money from his enemies. Interpretation of seeing meat for a single woman: If a girl sees that she is cutting the meat and distributing it, this indicates evil and failure to complete some matters in her life. Such as marriage or engagement. Seeing meat for a girl is a sign of evil, failure in life, and failure to achieve goals. If he sees a girl eating fish, he will get a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing meat for a married woman: Seeing a married woman with meat in a dream indicates a problem that she will fall into. Meat indicates Lack of livelihood and distress. Meat indicates the occurrence of some marital disputes. Interpretation of seeing meat for a pregnant woman. When she looks into a dream, he cuts meat with a knife, this indicates a male child. Meat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth without pain. Interpretation of seeing meat for a man. If you see a man in a dream, it indicates Beef to fatigue at work. If he sees roasted beef, this will be a deliverance from fear and he will get a lot of sustenance from lawful work. If he sees salted meat, this will be a lack of money. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: I know the interpretation of seeing a bride without a groom in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a bride without a groom in a dream is one of the dreams that raises a lot of doubts and anxiety among dreamers, for this reason today, through the Asrar Dream Interpretation website, we will discuss the interpretation in detail based on what the leading interpreters said. Seeing a bride without a groom in a dream A wedding without a groom in a dream is considered a sign However, the dreamer will make a series of fateful decisions in the coming period, according to which many changes will occur in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a wedding in a dream without the groom’s gift is a sign that the dreamer’s life will witness many changes that he did not expect before, and the interpretation of the dream It is also a sign of failure and making wrong decisions that will make the dreamer have a lot. Problems. Seeing a bride without a groom in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin, seeing a bride in a dream without a groom, indicates that the dreamer will work to make a large number of fateful decisions, and the dream also indicates entering a new stage that is much better than the stages that passed. Seeing the bride in Dreaming and seeing different weddings indicates that she will enjoy a lot of kindness, nourishment, and many benefits in the dreamer’s life. The marriage of a relative without seeing a wedding means moving on to a new beginning, just as the dream indicates a trip abroad. If you see a wedding with a vision of music and dancing and there is no groom, then this It indicates the death of a relative and this will be the cause of the dreamer's depression for a long time. Seeing a happy bride at her wedding without a groom’s gift is good news for fulfilling a wish in addition to complete self-reliance without asking anyone for help. Seeing a bride without a groom in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream a bride without marriage, this is evidence that the dreamer He will make many fateful decisions, and seeing the wedding without a groom for the estate and the bride’s face looked fearful and anxious, this indicates that the dreamer feels confused and anxious about many things and cannot make the right decision. If she sees that she is unmarried that she is preparing for marriage and has a lot of dancing and singing, but there is no A man is sitting next to the bride, it means that the dreamer has a big problem, in addition to hearing bad news. Seeing a bride without a groom in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is attending her wedding and wearing a white dress, but there is no groom, this is a sign that she is completely dependent on herself in many matters and makes her own decisions without taking advice from anyone. Where the dream explains the means of livelihood and blessing in her life. Seeing a bride without a groom in a dream, with loud singing and dancing, means that you have fallen into trouble, along with the anxiety and distress that will rule her. Seeing a bride without a groom in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a wedding without a groom for a pregnant woman is A sign of achieving many profits in addition to many good things that the dreamer will receive in her life, as considering her pregnant is considered a marriage with the vision of the bride being a Bedouin.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving onions in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving onions in a dream. For this reason, you should be careful and not completely believe in these interpretations. Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving onions in a dream: Giving a dead person onions in a dream may indicate bad news that may come to the dreamer in his life during this time. Whoever sees in a dream that the dead person He gave him onions, as it may indicate that the dead person needed alms and prayers for his soul a lot at that time. It is possible that the vision of giving the dead onions in a dream is an indication of bad events that the dreamer may face in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead again in A dream: In the event that you see a dead person dying again in a dream, this may indicate bad changes occurring to the dreamer, and God knows best. The dream of a dead person dying again, and there were shouts and screams that could indicate a problem that a family member fell into during this time, and God knows best. If we see the death of a deceased person in a dream, this may indicate a health problem that the dreamer or a member of his family may face during those days, and God knows best. In the event that a person mourns the death of the deceased again in a dream, this may indicate a crisis that the dreamer was facing in those days. And God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person whose clothes are torn in a dream: If the deceased sees his clothes torn in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to a financial crisis for some time. In the event that a person sees that the deceased has torn the clothes, this may indicate the suffering that The dreamer suffered from it a lot in those days. Dreaming of a dead person whose clothes were torn in a dream may indicate bad events that the dreamer may face in his life in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that the dead person has torn his clothes may indicate the severing of family ties in those days. And God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person watering crops in a dream. A dream about a deceased person watering the plants and his appearance is beautiful could indicate that the dreamer has achieved his goals and aspirations in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that the dead person was watering the plants may indicate good events that will come. For the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was watering the plants, may indicate the high position that the dreamer will reach in those days by the grace of God. And dreaming of the dead person watering the plants in a dream may indicate the good things that the deceased left for his family and that he helped them a lot in That time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead in wet clothes in a dream. Seeing the dead in wet clothes in a dream may indicate the dead person’s need for prayer and zakat at that time, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased’s clothes are wet with water could indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer. In his life, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing a dead person’s wet clothes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer great difficulties and crises in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person paralyzed in a dream: If a person sees a dead person paralyzed in a dream, this could be a sign A warning to the dreamer about the bad deeds he commits. It is possible to see a paralyzed father

title: Interpretation of watching television in a dream or television in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of television for a single girl, for a married girl, for a pregnant woman, or watching the creature. I dreamed that I bought a big, small, new, broken TV according to Ibn Sirin. Watching TV in a dream symbolizes good or bad news. The TV is a signal to the owner of the house. No house can do without the TV in the house. The TV can also symbolize power, authority, a teacher, or a policeman, depending on the materials. Shown on TV: The viewer's vision of color television shows a positive outlook on the future and the viewer's life, and seeing it display films, programs or series in black and white only symbolizes the viewer's inclinations and nostalgia for the past or the dominance of old and strict ideas. The viewer. It may also symbolize the viewer’s refusal to change and his tendency toward isolation, loneliness, and distance from people. First, we must agree that the meaning and interpretation of watching television in a dream is related to what is broadcast on its screen, or a program, series, movie, programme, etc. Seeing an unmarried girl as if she were on television in the place of a movie star could be, for example, as if she is getting married in this movie or that her wedding date is planned, for example, or that the movie’s heroes are in a movie that is with her at home, like her sleeping. Television has a great positive connotation for single people. When you hear and see good and happy news on it, or see attractive personalities and stars characterized by elegance, or see beautiful landscapes, but it is repulsive to watch the television malfunctioning, explode, or fall, or to transmit bad and sad news. As for watching the television in a married woman’s dream, it symbolizes the home. Or the home, and a married woman seeing the television in a clean and elegant place in the home symbolizes the stability and balance of the home and harmony and strong communication between family members. If the television is broken, smashed, or found in an unclean place, this symbolizes the difficulty of the family’s financial or social situation, or that this family’s A woman suffers from distraction due to disagreements and major problems. Seeing a married woman or a pregnant woman as if someone is telling her happy news on the television screen portends the return of an absent or traveler, the success and superiority of children, the husband’s promotion at work, or the husband’s pregnancy. A wife soon or an easy and blessed birth. Above all, the image that a married woman sees on television must be clear. As for seeing the viewer as if he were on a television screen, this portends the emergence of a prominent event in his life or that he will have a special place in people’s hearts, especially if he The viewer has a special appearance on television, like any famous or popular star or actor. Informational, but it is undesirable for one to see oneself sick, despondent, or with torn clothes on the TV screen. Repairing the TV and turning it on in a dream symbolizes positive changes that will happen to the viewer in the near future, and seeing it in a patient’s dream portends recovery. Seeing it in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes To marriage, and in a pregnant woman’s dream portends

title: Interpretation of a dream about the open sea for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the waves of the high sea in a dream for a single girl: The unmarried woman saw that he was going to the sea and the waves were high and she was looking at him very carefully. This dream shows that the girl’s dreams come true and her life changes and she lives a beautiful life different from the one she lived before. Seeing single women walking in The sea and the waves are high. Cue the approach of her engagement and the end of her problems immediately after her engagement. If a woman sits in the sea with the one she loves and the waves are high. Indicate her beautiful relationship with this person. Interpretation of sea waves in an unmarried woman’s dream is interpreted as life, kindness and livelihood. Seeing single women drowning in The sea due to high waves. Explain the problems that surround him from all sides and seek to get rid of them. Seeing a single woman swimming in the sea with high waves, and she was asking for help and screaming. It indicates a financial crisis that the dreamer will go through and she will try to seek help from her colleagues. If the unmarried woman sits On the sea, and contemplated the rising sea waves, and she is happy. Indicate that the girl has been waiting for the news that she has been trying to hear for a long time, and it will come true soon. Seeing intense crying due to the sea waves and fear of it. Indicates a problem that she will go through, whether emotional or functional. Seeing strong waves in an unmarried woman’s dream, and she was very worried about him, indicates her confusion about a certain matter. Fearing the turbulence of the sea because the waves are high, this indicates that there are evil people around the flag who wish her harm. See also: Seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of watching. The waves of the open sea in a dream for a married woman. A married woman was watching the high waves in the sea with her husband. The dream indicates the wonderful life of the woman with her husband, full of love and devotion. Seeing sadness in the features of the married woman as she watches the high waves of the sea. It indicates the loss of someone close to her, and God I know. It may refer to the bad circumstances that the insightful person experienced, which preoccupied her and exhausted her thoughts a lot. She tried to throw the married woman into the sea by herself and the sea waves were very high. The interpretation of this is that the woman is exposed to an accident that causes her to lose her life, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. The married woman saw the sea and the waves. High, the sky is clear, and the weather is beautiful. This indicates the good news that the fortuneteller will announce soon. He sees you sitting on the sea and the intensity of the sea waves washing over him. It indicates problems and misfortunes in the dreamer’s life and perhaps problems in her relationship with her husband that may lead to divorce. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a man and its meaning: vision A man watches the sea with his wife and the waves were high, indicating the intensity of his love for her. A man who swims in the sea and the waves are high indicates that he is a brave man and loves adventure. He watched diving and swimming in the sea with high waves. An indication of the dreamer’s decision to leave and travel to achieve his ambitions in a country other than his own. To see high waves in a man’s dream, interprets a lot of goodness and livelihood that will come to him soon. If a man sits with a child, he does not know him in the sea and the waves are high.

title: Interpretation of seeing a lot of money in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a lot of money: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of having money in a dream varied, as he proved that in some places it is a bad omen, and in other places it is a sign of good news. It indicates the attainment of wealth in reality. The arrival of abundant food and money in a dream can also be a source of anxiety and problems that the dreamer will face, depending on their amount. Ibn Sirin also identified a set of interpretations for seeing a lot of money in a dream depending on the different color or varying amounts. Seeing red money in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s shortcomings in worship, and seeing large amounts of paper money in a dream indicates goodness and blessings in health, children, and wealth. Whoever sees in a dream only one banknote, this may be evidence that God will give you a righteous son. And whoever sees in his dream that he is holding a banknote in his hand, this is evidence of the dreamer’s betrayal of the trustworthiness of one of his friends or relatives. Ibn Sirin said about coins in a dream. Its presence is evidence of blessing, strength, and goodness, regardless of its quantities, but if it is in very small or broken quantities, then this is evidence of debt, problems, and worries. Malik has one of the dream encounters. Interpretation of a lot of money in one dream. If an unmarried girl sees herself taking notes from someone, this is evidence of her future marriage or the acquisition of wealth or property through inheritance. Saving a lot of money in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees money Paper money in her dream is evidence of the stability of her marital and family life and a sense of security. Seeing silver coins is evidence of the birth of a female, and gold coins is evidence of a male. Reproduction.

If an unmarried girl sees herself taking notes from someone, this is evidence of her future marriage or the acquisition of wealth or property through inheritance. Saving a lot of money in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees money Paper money in her dream is evidence of the stability of her marital and family life and a sense of security. Seeing silver coins is evidence of the birth of a female, and gold coins is evidence of a male. Reproduction.

title: Interpretation of a comb in a dream: Seeing a comb in a dream

preview.html: A dream of a comb for a single girl, married, pregnant, or divorced, for a man, whether combing hair with a wooden or plastic comb. Interpretation scholars say that seeing a hair comb in a dream is evidence of a lot of goodness, happiness, and pleasure, and seeing a comb varies depending on the person who sees it, as the security he enjoys. Interpretation of a hair comb in a dream: A comb in a dream indicates justice, wisdom, and useful words that characterize the dreamer. The dream of a comb also symbolizes the joy and pleasure that the dreamer will enjoy in reality. The comb in a dream also indicates longevity, strength, and abundance of money. Dreaming about a comb can be interpreted as the equality with which the dreamer treats his friends and those close to him. Since the comb is one of the means of adornment in this world, and since the resulting adornment is not permanent, that is, temporary and does not last, it is included in the unity of the temporary interpretation of the event, whether it is joy or sadness. In all cases, it indicates happiness and kindness in a dream. The average person makes a mistake. Ibn Sirin says in some sayings: The use of combs and combs indicates the performance of zakat and its validity, and it also indicates knowledge of the means and its ease, and that he benefits from it, and it also indicates those who are in positions of rulers and. Ministers, as well as those in high cognitive positions such as wise men, doctors, judges, muftis, and preachers. Whoever dreams that he combs his head with a comb or with a beard: it is good for removing worry and distress from him, and if he is a farmer in his land and fields, it is good, even if he is a merchant. Blessing will be in his trade, and if hypocrites surround him, evil will come out of him, and if he has money and blessings, then his money is fixed in spending. For good and increased nutrition, and also whoever combs his hair quickly, indicates an aversion to harm, war, strife, and people discussing them. Interpretation of combing hair in a dream Combing hair in a dream indicates that the dreamer follows a different way of thinking. A dream about a hairstyle symbolizes the success of its owner, especially in Field of study and science. If a married woman combs her hair with an iron comb in a dream, this is a sign of the injustice and cruelty that she will suffer in her married life. The comb: Some said that it announces the happiness of the hour because it cleans, purifies, and adorns an ornament that does not last. It is said that the comb is fair. It is said that the hairstyle indicates the payment of zakat, and the comb in particular indicates knowledge and those who benefit from his command and words, such as the ruler, mufti, translator, preacher, and doctor. A comb in a dream is a useful person, and it is good evidence for someone who wants to join the court and cooperate with it. Because of his teeth. And laying off the zakat money comb. The comb is interpreted as a good man, and indicates those who will benefit from his words, such as the ruler, the doctor, and the orator. It was said: Sifting: sifting and sifting barley like a comb that removes dirt. It is said: sifting through weaving. It was said: The teeth of the comb saw the master. The comb is a sign of joy and happiness, and if he sees that he is wiping his head and beard with it, his anxiety and sadness will quickly disappear. The comb is a man with the same undifferentiated angel. If it is made of iron, then it is a philanthropist and a companion of the righteous Muslim Brotherhood. The comb indicates longevity, great wealth, and victory over enemies. The weaver’s comb and comb

title: Interpretation of a barrel in a dream - To see a barrel in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a barrel for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether buying a sale filled with water or oil, pouring perforated paint according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of a barrel in a dream If you see a barrel in your dream, it means that you impose conditions to get more. You will be lonely and lonely because you are acting selfishly instead of thanking God for your desire. The dream may indicate that you are not a helpful person and eventually there will be no one to trust. Also, a barrel in your dream symbolizes your belief that you can buy everything and money will solve any problem. Besides, if you see a full barrel, it means prosperous times and holidays. Seeing a barrel is a sign that the dreamer who constantly makes his life difficult in order to kill you more than he has in everything, will not find the happiness he is looking for in any way. It also says that people who They seek more and desire instead of thanking God for the blessings in their hands. After a while, they will be left alone with their money and have no one to trust as a result of their selfishness. He will not extend a helping hand to anyone who is poor or in need of help. It also indicates that seductive people who look at everyone with pride and arrogance and after a while understand that money cannot buy everything, but they will not be able to find anyone beside them. It also expresses that despite Greedy and rich, you have lived like the life of a destitute poor. For people working in the trade sector, this is a sign of an upcoming job interview, of concluding an agreement with new people they will meet, and of increasing profits that they will receive from establishing new branches. It also expresses that the dreamer, who His life is constantly going in a good direction, in a good and profitable business. It also expresses that he will get a house or a shop with the increasing strength of his knowledge and his life will continue in comfort and bliss due to continuous and permanent occupation. If you dream of a barrel, it means that you will have to fight to get rid of oppression. Broken barrels indicate separation from family or friends. Elk Drum: A drum with a capacity of 30 gallons or less. Seeing a barrel in a dream means abundance, money, the end of problem, and the end of debt. Seeing a full barrel in a dream symbolizes a lump sum or commodity that will come to your home. A barrel full of water in a dream indicates abundant halal profit. A barrel that is not visible from the inside means that you will be surprised and give gifts. Seeing many barrels in a dream may represent that abundance will lead to the destruction of the entire environment in which you live. If in a dream you see a barrel containing honey, oil, grape molasses, or various goods, it means abundance . Clicking or dreaming in a dream means that you will not satisfy your curiosity and uncertainty will continue for some time. If you dream that you are carrying a barrel or you see people carrying a barrel, it may mean that you will easily pay off your debts for your long-term investments or a good that you purchased in installments and get rid of your debts that you had Planned earlier.Interpretation of drawing a barrel in a dreamIf the paint and varnish are black

title: Interpretation of seeing receiving money in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of obtaining money in a dream or a dream through a website visionroy2a.com, money is one of the decorations of worldly life, and with it a person fulfills his requirements in life, and the more the owner enjoys the luxury and pleasures of the world and seeing money even in a dream that can cause a feeling of joy Happiness is for the one who sees it, but after waking up he wonders about the meaning of the dream and its interpretation, as well as about seeing and receiving money. The dream has many meanings. It could be a sign of goodness or a harbinger of the appearance of evil. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of receiving money in a dream according to the condition of the money and the person from whom it was taken. Depending on the fortuneteller’s condition and circumstances, whether he is male or female, single, married, or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of the vision in detail based on the opinion of senior commentators such as Ibn Sirin. Ibn Kathir, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing receiving money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing a man taking money from another person even though he has a lot indicates his bad behavior among people. Seeing someone paying money in a dream indicates that he will suffer great material losses, or An indication that he is spending his money on something that is useless. See also: Interpretation of a dream of losing money. Interpretation of seeing accepting money in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing another person earning money in a dream indicates the end of crises, freedom from sadness and anxiety, and the coming of goodness and healing. The dreamer’s vision He takes money from another person in a dream. It indicates crises and problems that he will face on his way, but he will overcome them quickly. Seeing saving money in a dream indicates a lot of money that the dreamer will soon obtain without effort or fatigue. Seeing money descending on the dreamer from the sky indicates The dreamer’s success in achieving his desires and achieving his goals. Seeing that you find money on the road foretells the problems that the god will face in the coming period, but they will be resolved after a short period of time. See also: Interpretation of seeing losing money in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing receiving coins in a dream: Seeing someone Someone gives him a bag of coins in a dream. It is an order or a secret, and the fortuneteller is ordered not to divulge or reveal it. Seeing old and dirty coins in a dream indicates the sadness and grief that will befall the viewer, or obscene statements that will be directed against him. Seeing broken coins in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be imprisoned, Or it indicates that something bad has happened, and God knows best. See also: The interpretation of seeing money in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single woman taking money from someone she knows in a dream shows that this person will stand by her side and help her get rid of a crisis that will pass. When Seeing an unmarried woman taking money from someone, you find her wanting. It says that she will spend her money on things and then regret it. Seeing an unmarried woman means that you will get money from someone you love in reality. It says that he will hear good news soon. Seeing an unmarried woman means taking money From someone you really hateThis is a sign that disagreements are in me

title: Interpretation of a dream about many snakes by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of many snakesThere is no doubt that seeing snakes in a dream causes panic and panic for many people who dream of it, so they ask all the time what is the interpretation of this vision and do its indications indicate the emergence of good things or is there something else that means behind it, and through this article we will interpret this vision to reassure the heart of the dreamer or the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream of many snakesThe interpretation of seeing many snakes in a dream explains that the dreamer is surrounded by many corrupt people who hate his life very much and pretend to love and be kind to him while they are planning great plots to fall into and he cannot get out of them easily. If a person sees many snakes roaming inside the rooms of the house in his dream, this indicates the presence of a great enemy in his life who wants to harm him and his evil, so one must be very careful about him in the coming periods so that he cannot harm him and must stay away from him completely and remove him from his life forever. Seeing a man in his dream with many colored snakes means that he is a corrupt person who has many wrong positions that he must get rid of once and for all so that he does not become A reason for destroying his life a lot. If someone sees many golden snakes in his dream, this symbolizes that he will receive a large inheritance, which will be a reason to change the course of his life completely for the better by the command of God. Interpretation of a dream of many snakes by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin said that if the owner of the dream sees many snakes in his sleep and they bite him until he cried and bled a lot and the snake tubes were on his feet, this indicates that he is a very bad person and has many bad qualities and morals that he must get rid of completely so that he does not alienate a large part of the people around him. The interpretation of seeing snakes during the dreamer's sleep also indicates that he will fall into many great calamities that happen to him because of the people closest to his life, so he must be very careful with them in the coming periods so that they cannot. It hurts him. If a person sees many snakes in his dream, this symbolizes that he will be exposed to losing a lot of money and large sums, which will be the reason for his feeling of financial discomfort. When a person sees many snakes, but when he hears the Holy Qur’an, they disappear during his sleep, this indicates that demons inhabit his house, and therefore he must strengthen his life by remembering God and reading the Holy Qur’an. Permanently and continuously during that period of his life. Interpretation of seeing many snakes in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried woman sees many snakes in her dream, this is a sign that she will suffer a lot from the many problems and crises that will happen to her because of the despicable people who surround her and plan great conspiracies. To fall into it and pretend to love and affection in front of her. When a girl sees that she is safely exiting a room full of snakes during her pregnancy, this means that she will overcome many crises and problems that
